alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 4:07PM EST until February 20 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers... Great Miami River at Miamitown. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Great Miami River at Miamitown. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, flooding occurs downstream of Miamitown in Miami and Whitewater Townships. Lawrenceburg Road is flooded between Miamiview Road and U.S. 50, as well as between suspension Bridge Road and Stephens Road. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 PM EST Thursday the stage was 8.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Friday morning to a crest of 20.1 feet early Friday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
